detaileddescription.para: Optimized BF16 GEMM Kernels for AVX-512
Layout: A: [M x K] row-major (BF16) B: [N x K] row-major, stored as [out x in] (BF16) C: [M x N] row-major (BF16 or FP32)

Key optimizations:
AVX-512 BF16 instructions (VDPBF16PS) when available
Cache blocking for L1/L2 efficiency
Vectorized BF16<->FP32 conversion
OpenMP parallelization

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint16_t *A, const uint16_t *B, const float *bias, float *C, int M, int N, int K)
memberdef.name: gemm_bf16_fp32out

detaileddescription.para: Uses direct BF16 GEMM instead of converting to FP32. Layout: input[T,D] -> fc1[T,4D] -> GELU -> fc2[T,D]

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint16_t *A, const uint16_t *B, const uint16_t *bias, uint16_t *C, int M, int N, int K)
memberdef.name: gemm_blocked_serial_bf16

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint16_t *A, const uint16_t *B, const uint16_t *bias, uint16_t *C, int M, int N, int K)
memberdef.name: gemm_nn_bf16

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint16_t *A, const uint16_t *B, const uint16_t *bias, uint16_t *C, int M, int N, int K)
memberdef.name: gemm_tn_bf16
